sect1.title: NFS Utilities-&nfs-utils-version; Client
sect1.para: The NFS Utilities package provides NFS server functionality as well as client software such as mount.nfs or umount.nfs. If you want to install it, the instructions can be found in Chapter 19 – . Note that if you only want to use the client, you do not need to run the server and so do not need the startup script and links. In accordance with good practice, only run the server if you actually need it (and if you don't know whether you need it or not, it's likely that you don't!).
